div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1261 Asia Minor, southern, 1947 Burial: c. 375 B.C. (M) Contents: 16+ AR Side: 3+ double-sigloi Celenderis: 3+ double-sigloi Issus: 3+ double-sigloi Mallus: 2+ double-sigloi Soli: 1+ double-sigloi Tarsus: 2+ double-sigloi Lapethus, Demonicus: 2+ double-sigloi Disposition: Copenhagen 12; London 4 Robinson, NC 1948, p. 43, illus.
